page.title: 14A Hastings Secondary School
page.content: My brother goes to{William Parker School.He is seventeen years old.He is doing French, Latin and History A_Levels this month.He spends two and a half hours a day studying.He thinks his A_Level subjects are interesting because he chose to do them.There are lots to choose from also sports and clubs to join.He does chess and hockey.The only bad thing about the school is its state of repair particularly the upper school buildings which were only supposed to last for twenty years and have so far been there for twenty three years. {William Parker School is the old {Grammar}School.When it turned Comprehensive some parents still fought to send their sons there even though they lived out of the area. However the situation is now resolving itself to most people's satisfaction.
